label: Baby Night Lights and Comforters
description: Products that provide comfort and light for babies and toddlers at night.
intents: Help babies sleep through the night
Provide comfort and security for babies
Provide soft lighting for nighttime feedings and diaper changes

subcategories.label: Sleep Aids
